title: Cassette Tape Recorder
description: This sample pack is a unique collection of sounds recorded from a real cassette deck, tape recorder and sounds created by audio cassettes.
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO

This sample pack is a unique collection of sounds recorded from a real cassette deck, tape recorder and sounds created by audio cassettes. Created in high quality 96 kHz 24 bit, this set includes sounds that evoke nostalgia for the era of audio cassettes.


Each sample accurately conveys the characteristic sounds created when a cassette recorder operates. Use these samples to add a retro vibe to your music compositions or sound design projects. The set contains playback, rewind and other typical Cassette Tape Recorder sounds. Dive into the world of analog recording and create unique content with this tape deck sample pack.

All sounds are recorded in WAV format, 96 kHz, 24 bit.


The following sounds are included:


  • Audio Cassette Movement
  • Put Audio Cassette In Case
  • Take Audio Cassette Out Case
  • Cassette Deck
  • Cassette Deck Eject Tape
  • Cassette Deck Insert Tape
  • Cassette Deck Operation During Playback Loop
  • Cassette Deck Rewind Tape
  • Cassette Tape Recorder
  • Cassette Recorder Eject Tape
  • Cassette Recorder Insert Tape
  • Cassette Tape Recorder Buttons
  • Rewinding Cassette in Deck During Playback

Cassette Tape Recorder - Sound List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 160

Number of Audio Cues: 160

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
